https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ogPvdjNIeb3uMejhyrGHsvrherj.jpg Following a series of intimate conversations between a former couple who lived through two years of domestic abuse, A Better Man infuses new energy and possibility into the movement to end violence against women. A Better Man
